system.workspace_params: { "autosave": false, "autosave_period": 120, "force_thread_sleep": 0.01, "Physics": { "Settings": { "constraint_iterations": 50, "emulation_step": 0.005, "global_erp": 0.2, "global_cfm": 0.0, "time_relation": 1.0, "physics_scale": 10.0, "sleeping_time": 2.0, "broadphase": 0, "solver": 0 }, "Debug": { "debug_contact_points": false, "debug_constraints": false, "debug_interval": 1000.0 } }, "Graphics": { "enable_graphics_engine": false, "Shadows": { "shadows_enabled": false, "component_shadows_enabled": false, "environment_shadows_enabled": true, "shadows_bias": -0.0001 }, "Lights": { "component_lights_enabled": true, "hemisphere_lights_enabled": true, "ambient_light_enabled": true, "ambient_light_color": [ 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 ], "ambient_light_intensity": 1.0, "directional_light_enabled": true, "directional_light_color": [ 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 ], "directional_light_intensity": 1.0, "directional_light_position": [ 0.0, 0.0, 5.0 ] }, "Ground": { "ground_enabled": true, "grid_enabled": true, "grid_size": 3, "ground_color": [ 0.7, 0.7, 0.7, 1.0 ] } } }
